name: Half Blood
description:
After another attack from the higher being, the village is again in danger and the village guards are highly tense. Ravana, one of the strongest guardians, was brought to his knees by the mighty being. He was petrified and scattered to pieces. Therefore, the other guardians must now come together to protect the people of this village. The village is shaking. Now it is your task to put an end to the cruel being with your power and the lost artefacts. But you can't get your father's words out of your mind: "Min-Jun you have been given a special task.
 There are some Bugs but we will fix it in the future
